'''Battlefront: Misty Dungeon''' is an event during [[Version 1.5]] in Genshin Impact.

{{Quote|Nothing from outside the Lost City can ever be taken inside. Assemble your adventure dream team and prepare to journey to a
place of profound secrets.}}

==Event Details==
===Event Duration===
2021-05-21 10:00:00 - 2021-05-31 03:59:59
===Requirements===
[[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above
===Summary===
*During the event, Travelers may assemble a team with the specific [[Trial Characters]] provided and challenge six trials of different themes. Complete the trial quests to obtain rewards such as [[Primogem]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], and [[Talent Level-Up Materials]].
*"Battlefront: Misty Dungeon" has a total of six trials with different themes. Starting with the first day of the event, two new trials will be unlocked every two days.
*In the trials of "Battlefront: Misty Dungeon," you must activate all the Ancient Runes within the time limit to gain access to the Final Challenge.
*Each trial has a different [[Ley Line Disorder]] and the distribution of [[enemies]] and [[Automated Weapon System|trap mechanisms]] also varies.
*In the trials, you may only use the specific trial characters provided, and [[Elemental Resonance]]s will not be available to you.
*If you have the trial character, the said trial character in the trial will adopt the [[Constellation]] levels of the character you actually own. If you do not have the trial character, the trial character's default Constellation level will be Lv. 0.

===Tutorial===
{| class="tdt1 tdt2" cellspacing="5"

| [[File:Tutorial Battlefront Misty Dungeon 2.png|200px]]
| Ancient Runes are the key to unlocking the Final Challenge. Each trial contains three deactivated Ancient Runes. Interact with these runes to start their respective challenges. Complete the challenges to direct the power of the Ancient Runes to the ruin control array linked to the entrance of the Final Challenge. Once the control array is fully powered up by all the ancient runes, you can use it to begin the Final Challenge.
|-
| [[File:Tutorial Battlefront Misty Dungeon 3.png|200px]]
| You can choose from various challenges and Benediction mechanics within the trials. Complete these challenge to obtain certain bonus effects. Complete the {{Color|bp|Rejuvenation}} challenge to revive all characters in your party and restore their HP. Complete the {{Color|Pyro|Plunder}} challenge to obtain an ATK increase. Complete the {{Color|Hydro|Godspeed}} challenge to gain a Movement SPD increase. Complete the {{Color|Cryo|Everlasting}} challenge to greatly extend the challenge time remaining.
|-
| [[File:Tutorial Battlefront Misty Dungeon 4.png|200px]]
| There are [[Automated Weapon System|automated weapons systems]] within "Battlefront: Misty Dungeon" that will detect and attack any intruders. Use the appropriate reactions to temporarily disable these devices.
|}

==Trials==
"Battlefront: Misty Dungeon" has a total of six trials with different themes. Starting with the first day of the event, two new trials will be unlocked every two days. Each themed trial has a different distribution of monsters, trap mechanisms, trial quests,
and Ley Line Disorders that await you. Complete 5 trial quests per themed trial to receive [[Primogems]], [[Hero's Wit]], [[Talent Books]], [[Mora]], and [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]]. Rewards from trial quests may be claimed once the requirements have been met, even if the player leaves or quits the domain.
